title: What are the 7 new wonders for the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Great Wall of China The pyramids of Giza Hanging Gardens of Babylon Iraq Stonehengs England light house of Alaxendria Egypt statue ofZeus at Olympia Mausoleum of Halicarnassus Colossus of Rhodes

As per the voting in 2007, the 7 new wonders for the world are: The Taj MahalChichen ItzaChrist the RedeemerThe ColosseumGreat wall in ChinaThe Machu PichuThe PetraShort Notes on the 7 wonders for the world
